DOC.brief_summary: This study design Phase-I , 2-period , cross-over , randomised , open-label , single centre study determine bioequivalence single 32 mg dose propose commercial oral suspension candesartan cilexetil ( 1 mg/mL ) single 32 mg dose candesartan cilexetil oral suspension ( 1.6 mg/mL ) use paediatric program .
